issue.title: [C++] Change compute::Arity:VarArgs min_args default to 0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8929](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8929). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The issue of minimum number of arguments is separate from providing an `InputType` for input type checking.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8929?focusedCommentId=17121473) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
